name: RIIZE
description: RIIZE is SM Entertainment's newest boy group, known for their fresh concept, powerful performances, and instant rookie success.

funFacts: Was in NCT before joining RIIZE
Known for his exceptional dancing skills
members.bio: Shotaro is RIIZE's Japanese leader and main dancer, previously in NCT. His exceptional dance skills and bright smile have made him beloved. He brings experience and positivity to the new group.

funFacts: Has a cold, chic image on stage
His dance skills are very refined
members.bio: Eunseok is RIIZE's visual with model-like proportions. His cold, elegant image on stage contrasts with his quiet personality. His striking looks and dancing have made him a fan favorite.

funFacts: One of the tallest K-Pop idols at 186cm
Was in NCT before joining RIIZE
Known for his rap skills and deep voice
His tall frame stands out on stage
members.bio: Sungchan is RIIZE's rapper and one of K-Pop's tallest idols at 186cm. Previously in NCT, he brings experience and skill. His deep voice and gentle giant personality are beloved.

funFacts: Went viral pre-debut for his visuals
members.bio: Wonbin is RIIZE's visual who went viral before debut for his stunning looks. Named after the famous actor, he lives up to the name. His prince-like visuals and shy personality are endearing.

funFacts: Known for his powerful, stable vocals
His live vocals match studio versions
members.bio: Sohee is RIIZE's main vocalist with powerful, stable vocals. His high notes and passionate delivery anchor RIIZE's sound. His cheerful personality brightens the group dynamic.

funFacts: Half Korean, half American (father is Yoon Sang)
Born and raised in New York
Despite his size, he's the youngest
members.bio: Anton is RIIZE's maknae and tallest member at 187cm. Half-Korean and raised in New York, he's fluent in both languages. His 'giant baby' charm and musical heritage (son of composer Yoon Sang) make him special.

seo.title: RIIZE Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with BRIIZE
seo.description: Create your RIIZE name with Shotaro, Wonbin, Anton & all 6 members! Instant chemistry scores & Korean stage names. Perfect for BRIIZE fanfiction.
